title: Looking to make a Silver team
body:
Looking for players that want to get better, will listen, already have a fair amount of game knowledge they can share with the team and to not be toxic in general. I play a lot, and would like a five man that can do the same. Please state your current div, what you want from being in a team and your best champs in the role you would like to try for.

Would prefer mics, relatively empty schedule and the roles filled at the moment are:

Adc:
Support:
Mid: Filled
Top:
Jungle:

replies.body: Currently fluctuating between Silver IV and V, in preseason managed to make Gold V. Currently on a bit of a bad streak but always seem to do better when playing with a team (especially with comms). The last two season I have mained ADC but am also very solid on support where I also enjoy shot calling (which I would prefer to main if I could eventually get myself to an elo that I can **always** trust my adc). My best champs are Caitlyn, Jinx and Trist. What I'd like to get from being in a team is having a bit of fun but also improving as a team and slowly all working our way up eventually. IGN: flametortur

Reiyss - I haven't ranked this season yet, but I was Silver II or III last season (I was placed in Silver IV initially). I main Support, but can also play ADC if necessary. I would like teamwork, consistency and people to listen to each other etc from a team (and to grow/learn with) as solo queue isn't quite doing it for me, and I also enjoy playing with a team. My previous ranked team's division last season was Silver I until most of the team stopped playing.
My best champions are Janna, Sona, Nami, and Leona - however I can play most supports (will need to work on Morgana and Thresh though).
Please contact me ingame if interested.
Thank you.

Darth R2
sliver 2 (g3 last season)
jg or support
Hi, I main ADC but I also play mid and am practising JG at the moment too. IGN: rose2424
main adc im s1 atm was g3 last season have a mic add White thunder to discuss

I main Zac in the jungle, but also have a lot of experience in the top lane. (Mainly because I love bruisers and tanks)
Would definitely be interested.
